title: Design Architecture for RealTimeEventProcessingEngine
description: Create a high-level design of the system architecture that meets the performance requirements.

title: Develop High-Performance Event Handling Component
description: Design and implement a high-performance component that can handle millions of events per second with sub-millisecond latency. The component should be optimized for scalability, fault tolerance, and efficiency to ensure high throughput and low latency.

title: Develop UI for Monitoring and Management of RealTimeEventProcessingEngine
description: Create a user-friendly interface for monitoring and managing the engine's performance, event streams, and configuration settings. The UI should provide real-time analytics, customizable dashboards, and an intuitive navigation system. Additionally, consider incorporating features such as error logging, alerts, and user permissions for secure access.

title: Implement Database Schema for Event Storage (Revised)
description: Design and implement an efficient database schema supporting fast retrieval of events for the RealTimeEventProcessingEngine. The schema should be optimized for sub-millisecond latency suitable for high-volume, real-time data processing. Include considerations for sharding, indexing, and transaction handling to ensure scalability and performance.

title: Optimize Performance of RealTimeEventProcessingEngine
description: Perform profiling and optimization to ensure the engine can meet its performance requirements.

title: Security Analysis and Vulnerability Assessment
description: Conduct a thorough security analysis of the system to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

title: Create Technical Documentation for RealTimeEventProcessingEngine
description: Develop comprehensive technical documentation detailing the system architecture, component functionalities, and usage instructions.
